LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.AddressOverride.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: For people who already have WsPay accounts and whom you already prompted for a shipping address before they choose to pay with WsPay, you can use the entered address instead of the address the person has stored with WsPay.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.EnableIpn.Hint2
LocaleResource.Value: Leave blank to use the default IPN handler URL.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.PassProductNamesAndTotals
LocaleResource.Value: Pass product names and order totals to HT WsPay

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.PassProductNamesAndTotals.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if product names and order totals should be passed to HT WsPay.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: Plaćanje karticama ili PayPal računom vrši se putem WSpay sustava.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.Fields.ReturnFromWsPayWithoutPaymentRedirectsToOrderDetailsPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable if a customer should be redirected to the order details page when he clicks "return to store" link on WsPay site WITHOUT completing a payment

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.JavascriptIsTurnOn
LocaleResource.Value: If your browser does not have JavaScript enabled, click on PAYMENT button.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.PaymentMethodDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Plaćanje kreditnim/debitnim karticama ili PayPal računom

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.PleaseWait
LocaleResource.Value: Please wait for authorization to process ...

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.RoundingWarning
LocaleResource.Value: It looks like you have "ShoppingCartSettings.RoundPricesDuringCalculation" setting disabled. Keep in mind that this can lead to a discrepancy of the order total amount, as WsPay only rounds to two decimals.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.WsPay.PaymentTimeoutWarning
LocaleResource.Value: Upozorenje: plaćanje je otkazano zbog isteka vremena
